column1: Topic title: Wan Azizah  Pakatan Harapan Postpones Registration

column8: text

PKR president Dr Wan Azizah says the four parties in Pakatan Harapan have yet to come to a consensus over its top leadership composition.Pakatan Harapan (PH) today said it was still trying to resolve differences over its leadership line-up, with a view to having the coalition registered after the Raya holidays.Opposition leader and PKR president Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail said they had yet to reach a consensus on the structure of the coalition which includes PKR, DAP, Amanah and PPBM.“We are still discussing among ourselves before we can come to a consensus by all four parties,” she told reporters at the PKR headquarters.She added that pending leadership line-up, the registration of the pact with the Registrar of Societies (RoS) would be delayed until after the Raya holidays.Previously, Wan Azizah said the coalition was aiming to be registered before Raya.The Permatang Pauh MP meanwhile declined to comment on the growing controversy surrounding the naming of the opposition’s prime minister-designate, saying it was more important to win the next general election first.“Let us win first, then we can talk about who will become the prime minister,” she added.http://www.freemalaysiatoday.com/category/...ng-top-line-up/
